DocConstant.Name: SHOULDER
DocConstant.Documentation: A lateral part of Road adjacent to, and usually at the same level as the Carriageway; not intended for vehicular traffic but may be used in case of emergency. NOTE Definition from ISO 6707-1: part of a highway alongside a carriageway and at approximately the same level, exclusive of embankment or cutting slopes, (Shoulder, US). NOTE Definition from PIARC: Part of the roadway between the carriageway and the ditch or the (cutting or embankment) slope, which gives the carriageway lateral support.
